data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Piemonte, Italy that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Piemonte, Italy
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 64,766 believers in Piemonte against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the state of Piemonte, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Piemonte, Italy.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Arab, Sudanese people. 0.5% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Piemonte to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 64,766 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

data.section_summary:
the state of Piemonte, Italy has a population of 4,446,200.

We estimate Piemonte has 64,766 people who might know Jesus, 3,551,491 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 829,943 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 4,446,200 citizens of the the state of Piemonte.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.
